title: Low Poly Stylized Forest Landscape Props
description: Craft enchanting low-poly stylized forests with ease! This pack offers an array of charming landscape props: trees, bushes, flowers, mushrooms, bridges, fence, grass, and platforms. Dive into a world of creativity and build your dream woodland scene.
longDescription:
Embark on a journey of imagination and creativity with our meticulously crafted Low Poly Stylized Forest Landscape Props pack, designed exclusively for Unreal Engine. This comprehensive collection empowers you to construct captivating and immersive woodland environments that transport players and viewers to a realm of wonder.

Within this expansive package, you'll discover an enchanting array of elements meticulously designed to infuse your forest scenes with life and charm. Delve into a captivating selection of trees, each possessing its unique character and form, from towering sentinels that reach for the skies to graceful saplings that dance in the breeze. These trees are not mere static assets; they're vibrant components of your narrative, adding depth and resonance to your virtual world.

As you wander through this digital forest, you'll encounter an assortment of bushes, their foliage varying in shape and hue, lending authenticity to the natural diversity of the wilderness. Vibrant flowers punctuate the landscape with bursts of color, while delicate mushrooms emerge from the forest floor, inviting exploration and discovery.

Traverse quaint bridges that arch gracefully over babbling brooks, connecting different parts of your world and inviting players to cross into new territories. Enclose your domain with a charming fence, providing both a sense of containment and a touch of rustic elegance.

To further enhance the ambiance of your forest realm, the pack features a lush variety of grasses that sway gently in the wind, evoking a sense of tranquility and serenity. Meanwhile, sturdy platforms serve as stages for adventures and narratives to unfold, each one waiting to support the weight of tales yet untold.

Immerse yourself in the realm of low-poly stylized aesthetics, where each prop is a brushstroke on the canvas of your imagination. Whether you're creating a magical fairy glade, an enchanted forest kingdom, or a tranquil natural haven, our Forest Landscape Props pack is your key to bringing these visions to life. Embrace the fusion of artistry and technology, and let your creativity flourish amidst the beauty of the digital wilderness.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  61 unique meshes total
  • 23 materials (Leaves and GrassWind texture have wind like movement included)
  •  48 mushrooms, 12 varieties with 4 color variations
  • 6 Bushes
  • 6 Flowers
  • 2 Grass Clumps
  • 1 Grass mesh optimized for use as Foliage
  • 1 log
  • 2 Bridges
  • 1 Fence
  • 7 Rocks
  • 6 Grass Platforms
  • 6 Rock Platforms
  • 2 Stumps
  • 9 Trees

Number of Unique Meshes: 61

Collision: Yes, automatically generated

Vertex Count: 9,527

LODs: No

Number of Materials and Material Instances: 23

Number of Textures: 0

Texture Resolutions: N/A

Supported Development Platforms: Tested on a Windows-64 system. As basic models this asset pack should work on all supported UE4 platforms.

Documentation: Simple static meshes that can be dragged and dropped into your scene.
